page.title: 05Farming (Part4)
page.content: {My farm by Calvin Thomas. I live on Glan-y-nant farm in the Pengam region.The old name for the farm was Tir-Pengam. It is 350 years old,covers 50 acres and is now called Green-meadow farm. About 150 years ago my farm land extended over Glan-y-nant up to the bus depot.It had many green fields,and there were lanes from the farm to the villages of Cascade and Ystrad Mynach.The council bought the land and built houses on the ground. they also built a main road through the centre of the farm.Most of the land is intensively managed grass land for grazing.Horses are tacked,and silage is produced annually. {______________________
